system.requirements: Pathfinding Kit, Empty Book or Paper
system.summary: Create a new guidebook with helpful wilderness information.

description.value:
As a Long Rest Action, you can turn a book or unfilled paper into a Pathfinder’s Guide, adding one chapter to it in the process.
Any creature that can read the Pathfinder’s Guide can study up to 3 chapters of it as a short rest, gaining each chapter’s benefits until their next rest. Bonuses from chapters cannot be stacked, and each physical chapter can only be studied by one creature per rest.

See @Compendium[undertaking.rest-actions.1HMFWYGIRHKP1PBG]{Expand Pathfinder's Guide} for possible chapters you can add.
